subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Rajon Rondo had 16 points, 14 assists and 11 rebounds and the Boston Celtics handed the visiting Miami Heat their biggest loss of the season, 91-72, on Sunday.
snippet: Rajon Rondo had 16 points, 14 assists and 11 rebounds and the Boston Celtics handed the visiting Miami Heat their biggest loss of the season, 91-72, on Sunday.
